duties_responsibilities.duty: Answer telephone and written or Internet-based inquiries of a technical or complex nature from customers regarding company products.
Analyze non-routine problems with nonfunctioning electro/mechanical equipment or software applications to identify problem areas and recommend corrective action.
Maintain a log of problems for reporting to product development and handle problem resolution, including follow-up and escalation as needed.
Adapt response and conduct extensive research according to customer needs and may orient, train, or check the work of other employees.
Navigate multiple computer screens and programs while interacting with customers.
Be available to work a flexible schedule including days, nights, weekends, and holidays.
